.section .data
t1: .word 0
a: .word 0

.section .rodata
end_msg: .asciz "terminado\n"

.section .text
.globl my_logic
my_logic:
    la s1, a
    la s0, t1
    li t0, 3
    sw t0, 0(s1)
    lw t0, 0(s1)
    li t1, 5
    add t2, t0, t1
    sw t2, 0(s0)
    lw a0, 0(s0)
    li a7, 1
    ecall
    li a0, 10
    li a7, 11
    ecall
    la a0, end_msg
    li a7, 93
    li a0, 0
    ecall
